meanings.definition: A person or animal that climbs.
meanings.sent1: The brave climbers reached the mountain peak.
meanings.sent2: The monkeys are skilled climbers in the jungle.
meanings.sent3: The climbers had a race to see who could reach the top first.
meanings.sent4: In the city, ambitious climbers strive to climb the corporate ladder.
meanings.sent5: The climbers in the competition showed great determination and strength.

meanings.definition: A plant that climbs or grows by clinging to a support.
meanings.sent1: The ivy and other climbers covered the walls of the old building.
meanings.sent2: The grapevines are popular climbers in many gardens.
meanings.sent3: The climbers in the garden seemed to be playing a game of tag with the fence.
meanings.sent4: The passionflower is a beautiful climber, adding charm to any garden.
meanings.sent5: The morning glories are delicate climbers that bring color to the trellis.
